node.Title: How our content abuse defense systems work to keep members safe
node.Description: To create a safe and trusted experience for our members, our Trust & Safety (TnS) team strives to keep content that violates our Professional Community Policies off of LinkedIn. In this blog post, we’ll provide insight into how we try to ensure conversations remain respectful and professional on our platform. Content is created and shared on LinkedIn in large volumes every minute, from articles and messages, to images and videos. We have a multidimensional approach with three layers of protection within our ecosystem to help us filter out content that violates our policies to keep […]
